statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 4 , -3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x + 8 , 5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 3 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
